name: EMES International Research Network
headAddress: EMES Network, c/o Centre d'économie sociale
goal: EMES is a research network of established university research centres and individual researchers whose goal has been so far to gradually build up an international corpus of theoretical and empirical knowledge, pluralistic in disciplines and methodologies, around our “SE” concepts: social enterprise, social entrepreneurship, social economy, solidarity economy and social innovation.
interests: Business and Industry, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
- Social Business Initiative follow-up
- Update of the Mapping of Social Enterprises
- European Pillar of Social Rights
- Social Finance initiatives
